Item ID5992

Apple mush is made by putting four cooking apples into an apple press, crushing them, and filling a bucket with the result.

Brewing cider requires four apple mush in the fermenting vat, therefore 16 cooking apples are needed in total to make a full brew of eight beer glasses or two calquat kegs of cider or mature cider.

Instructions[edit | edit source]

Steps
1. Put 4 cooking apples into an apple press
2. Crush them
3. Use 1 bucket on the apple press
